front.title: IEEE Standard for WirelessMAN-Advanced Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems Amendment 1: Enhancements to Support Machine-to-Machine Applications

abstract.t: Enhancements to the WirelessMAN-Advanced Air Interface, an air interface designated as \“IMT-Advanced\” by the International Telecommunication Union-Radiocommunication Sector (ITU-R), are specified in this standard. Improved support for machine-to-machine applications are provided by these enhancements.
